$ec2Client = new Aws\Ec2\Ec2Client([
    'region' => 'us-west-2',
    'version' => '2016-11-15',
    'profile' => 'default'
]);

$action = 'START';

$instanceIds = array('InstanceID1', 'InstanceID2');

if ($action == 'START') {
    $result = $ec2Client->startInstances(array(
        'InstanceIds' => $instanceIds,
    ));
} else {
    $result = $ec2Client->stopInstances(array(
        'InstanceIds' => $instanceIds,
    ));
}

var_dump($result);
